Angry giant rats are monsters that appear during and after A Soul's Bane in Tolna's rift. The rat near the entrance is the only monster in Tolna's rift that drops an item when killed.

During the quest, they can only be killed with the anger maul. Angry giant rats can be fought with any weapon after the quest. Angry giant rats do count toward a Rats slayer assignment.

Contents

  • 1 Locations
  • 2 Drops
    • 2.1 100%
  • 3 Update history

Update history[edit | edit source]

This information has been compiled as part of the update history project. Some updates may not be included – see here for how to help out!
  • patch 22 January 2024 (Update):
    • Updated the Angry Unicorn, Bear and Giant Rat in Tolna's Rift to use newer models.
  • update 3 April 2006 (Update):
    • Added to game.
